title: S&P's Kessler Sees Lots More Growth, Upside To Facebook (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Scott Kessler, Deputy Global Director for Equity Research at S&P Capital, on Facebook's annual meeting.
